meanings.definition: A space left by indenting a line or block of text.
meanings.sent1: I noticed a small indentation at the beginning of the paragraph.
meanings.sent2: The indentation in the document made it easier to read.
meanings.sent3: The indentation in the paper looked like a tiny cave entrance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile left an indentation in my heart that I couldn't ignore.
meanings.sent5: The indentation in the sand revealed where the treasure was buried.

meanings.definition: The act of indenting or the state of being indented.
meanings.sent1: The indentation of the text made it more organized.
meanings.sent2: She always checks for proper indentation before submitting her work.
meanings.sent3: The indentation on the paper resembled a row of tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent4: His words left a deep indentation in her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The indentation of the keys on the piano created a beautiful melody.
